mlDocs.author: Bhikkhu Sujato

mn30:8.8.pli: Lābhasakkārasilokena ca ye aññe dhammā uttaritarā ca paṇītatarā ca tesaṁ dhammānaṁ sacchikiriyāya na chandaṁ janeti, na vāyamati, olīnavuttiko ca hoti sāthaliko.
mn30:8.8.en: They become lazy and slack on account of their possessions, honor, and popularity, not generating enthusiasm or trying to realize those things that are better and finer. …

mn30:9.7.pli: Lābhasakkārasilokena ca ye aññe dhammā uttaritarā ca paṇītatarā ca tesaṁ dhammānaṁ sacchikiriyāya chandaṁ janeti, vāyamati, anolīnavuttiko ca hoti asāthaliko.
mn30:9.7.en: They don’t become lazy and slack regarding their possessions, honor, and popularity, but generate enthusiasm and try to realize those things that are better and finer.

mn30:9.12.pli: Sīlasampadāya ca ye aññe dhammā uttaritarā ca paṇītatarā ca tesaṁ dhammānaṁ sacchikiriyāya na chandaṁ janeti, na vāyamati, olīnavuttiko ca hoti sāthaliko.
mn30:9.12.en: They become lazy and slack regarding their accomplishment in ethics, not generating enthusiasm or trying to realize those things that are better and finer. …

mn30:10.16.pli: Samādhisampadāya ca ye aññe dhammā uttaritarā ca paṇītatarā ca, tesaṁ dhammānaṁ sacchikiriyāya na chandaṁ janeti, na vāyamati, olīnavuttiko ca hoti sāthaliko.
mn30:10.16.en: They become lazy and slack regarding their accomplishment in immersion, not generating enthusiasm or trying to realize those things that are better and finer. …

mn30:11.20.pli: Ñāṇadassanena ca ye aññe dhammā uttaritarā ca paṇītatarā ca tesaṁ dhammānaṁ sacchikiriyāya na chandaṁ janeti, na vāyamati, olīnavuttiko ca hoti sāthaliko.
mn30:11.20.en: They become lazy and slack regarding their knowledge and vision, not generating enthusiasm or trying to realize those things that are better and finer. …

mn30:12.7.pli: Lābhasakkārasilokena ca ye aññe dhammā uttaritarā ca paṇītatarā ca tesaṁ dhammānaṁ sacchikiriyāya chandaṁ janeti, vāyamati, anolīnavuttiko ca hoti asāthaliko.
mn30:12.7.en: They don’t become lazy and slack on account of their possessions, honor, and popularity, but generate enthusiasm and try to realize those things that are better and finer.

mn30:12.11.pli: Sīlasampadāya ca ye aññe dhammā uttaritarā ca paṇītatarā ca tesaṁ dhammānaṁ sacchikiriyāya chandaṁ janeti, vāyamati, anolīnavuttiko ca hoti asāthaliko.
mn30:12.11.en: They don’t become lazy and slack regarding their accomplishment in ethics, but generate enthusiasm and try to realize those things that are better and finer.

mn30:12.15.pli: Samādhisampadāya ca ye aññe dhammā uttaritarā ca paṇītatarā ca tesaṁ dhammānaṁ sacchikiriyāya chandaṁ janeti, vāyamati, anolīnavuttiko ca hoti asāthaliko.
mn30:12.15.en: They don’t become lazy and slack regarding their accomplishment in immersion, but generate enthusiasm and try to realize those things that are better and finer.

mn30:12.19.pli: Ñāṇadassanena ca ye aññe dhammā uttaritarā ca paṇītatarā ca tesaṁ dhammānaṁ sacchikiriyāya chandaṁ janeti, vāyamati, anolīnavuttiko ca hoti asāthaliko.
mn30:12.19.en: They don’t become lazy and slack regarding their knowledge and vision, but generate enthusiasm and try to realize those things that are better and finer.

mn30:12.20.pli: Katame ca, brāhmaṇa, dhammā ñāṇadassanena uttaritarā ca paṇītatarā ca?
mn30:12.20.en: And what are those things that are better and finer than knowledge and vision?

mn30:13.2.pli: Ayampi kho, brāhmaṇa, dhammo ñāṇadassanena uttaritaro ca paṇītataro ca.
mn30:13.2.en: This is something better and finer than knowledge and vision.

mn30:14.2.pli: Ayampi kho, brāhmaṇa, dhammo ñāṇadassanena uttaritaro ca paṇītataro ca.
mn30:14.2.en: This too is something better and finer than knowledge and vision.

mn30:15.2.pli: Ayampi kho, brāhmaṇa, dhammo ñāṇadassanena uttaritaro ca paṇītataro ca.
mn30:15.2.en: This too is something better and finer than knowledge and vision.

mn30:16.2.pli: Ayampi kho, brāhmaṇa, dhammo ñāṇadassanena uttaritaro ca paṇītataro ca.
mn30:16.2.en: This too is something better and finer than knowledge and vision.

mn30:17.2.pli: Ayampi kho, brāhmaṇa, dhammo ñāṇadassanena uttaritaro ca paṇītataro ca.
mn30:17.2.en: This too is something better and finer than knowledge and vision.

mn30:18.2.pli: Ayampi kho, brāhmaṇa, dhammo ñāṇadassanena uttaritaro ca paṇītataro ca.
mn30:18.2.en: This too is something better and finer than knowledge and vision.

mn30:19.2.pli: Ayampi kho, brāhmaṇa, dhammo ñāṇadassanena uttaritaro ca paṇītataro ca.
mn30:19.2.en: This too is something better and finer than knowledge and vision.

mn30:20.2.pli: Ayampi kho, brāhmaṇa, dhammo ñāṇadassanena uttaritaro ca paṇītataro ca.
mn30:20.2.en: This too is something better and finer than knowledge and vision.

mn30:21.2.pli: Ayampi kho, brāhmaṇa, dhammo ñāṇadassanena uttaritaro ca paṇītataro ca.
mn30:21.2.en: This too is something better and finer than knowledge and vision.

mn30:21.3.pli: Ime kho, brāhmaṇa, dhammā ñāṇadassanena uttaritarā ca paṇītatarā ca.
mn30:21.3.en: These are the things that are better and finer than knowledge and vision.

mlDocs.title:
Middle Discourses 30
The Shorter Simile of the Heartwood

mlDocs.author: Bhikkhu Sujato

dn2:39.1.pli: “Sakkā pana, bhante, aññampi diṭṭheva dhamme sandiṭṭhikaṁ sāmaññaphalaṁ paññapetuṁ imehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañcā”ti?
dn2:39.1.en: “But sir, can you point out a fruit of the ascetic life that’s apparent in this very life which is better and finer than these?”

dn2:76.3.pli: Idampi kho, mahārāja, sandiṭṭhikaṁ sāmaññaphalaṁ purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
dn2:76.3.en: This, great king, is a fruit of the ascetic life that’s apparent in the present life which is better and finer than the former ones.

dn2:78.4.pli: Idampi kho, mahārāja, sandiṭṭhikaṁ sāmaññaphalaṁ purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
dn2:78.4.en: This too, great king, is a fruit of the ascetic life that’s apparent in the present life which is better and finer than the former ones.

dn2:80.3.pli: Idampi kho, mahārāja, sandiṭṭhikaṁ sāmaññaphalaṁ purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
dn2:80.3.en: This too, great king, is a fruit of the ascetic life that’s apparent in the present life which is better and finer than the former ones.

dn2:82.3.pli: Idampi kho, mahārāja, sandiṭṭhikaṁ sāmaññaphalaṁ purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
dn2:82.3.en: This too, great king, is a fruit of the ascetic life that’s apparent in the present life which is better and finer than the former ones.

dn2:84.10.pli: Idampi kho, mahārāja, sandiṭṭhikaṁ sāmaññaphalaṁ purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
dn2:84.10.en: This too, great king, is a fruit of the ascetic life that’s apparent in the present life which is better and finer than the former ones.

dn2:86.12.pli: Idampi kho, mahārāja, sandiṭṭhikaṁ sāmaññaphalaṁ purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
dn2:86.12.en: This too, great king, is a fruit of the ascetic life that’s apparent in the present life which is better and finer than the former ones.

dn2:88.6.pli: Idampi kho, mahārāja, sandiṭṭhikaṁ sāmaññaphalaṁ purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
dn2:88.6.en: This too, great king, is a fruit of the ascetic life that’s apparent in the present life which is better and finer than the former ones.

dn2:90.4.pli: Idampi kho, mahārāja, sandiṭṭhikaṁ sāmaññaphalaṁ purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
dn2:90.4.en: This too, great king, is a fruit of the ascetic life that’s apparent in the present life which is better and finer than the former ones.

dn2:92.20.pli: Idampi kho, mahārāja, sandiṭṭhikaṁ sāmaññaphalaṁ purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
dn2:92.20.en: This too, great king, is a fruit of the ascetic life that’s apparent in the present life which is better and finer than the former ones.

dn2:94.4.pli: Idampi kho, mahārāja, sandiṭṭhikaṁ sāmaññaphalaṁ purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
dn2:94.4.en: This too, great king, is a fruit of the ascetic life that’s apparent in the present life which is better and finer than the former ones.

dn2:96.4.pli: Idampi kho, mahārāja, sandiṭṭhikaṁ sāmaññaphalaṁ purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
dn2:96.4.en: This too, great king, is a fruit of the ascetic life that’s apparent in the present life which is better and finer than the former ones.

dn2:98.8.pli: Idaṁ kho, mahārāja, sandiṭṭhikaṁ sāmaññaphalaṁ purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
dn2:98.8.en: This too, great king, is a fruit of the ascetic life that’s apparent in the present life which is better and finer than the former ones.

dn2:98.9.pli: Imasmā ca pana, mahārāja, sandiṭṭhikā sāmaññaphalā aññaṁ sandiṭṭhikaṁ sāmaññaphalaṁ uttaritaraṁ vā paṇītataraṁ vā natthī”ti.
dn2:98.9.en: And, great king, there is no other fruit of the ascetic life apparent in the present life which is better and finer than this.”

mlDocs.title:
Long Discourses 2
The Fruits of the Ascetic Life

an4.16:1.4.pli: tena ca rūpasokhummena aññaṁ rūpasokhummaṁ uttaritaraṁ vā paṇītataraṁ vā na samanupassati;
an4.16:1.4.en: They don’t see any other subtlety of form that’s better or finer than that,

an4.16:1.7.pli: tena ca vedanāsokhummena aññaṁ vedanāsokhummaṁ uttaritaraṁ vā paṇītataraṁ vā na samanupassati;
an4.16:1.7.en: They don’t see any other subtlety of feeling that’s better or finer than that,

an4.16:1.10.pli: tena ca saññāsokhummena aññaṁ saññāsokhummaṁ uttaritaraṁ vā paṇītataraṁ vā na samanupassati;
an4.16:1.10.en: They don’t see any other subtlety of perception that’s better or finer than that,

an4.16:1.13.pli: tena ca saṅkhārasokhummena aññaṁ saṅkhārasokhummaṁ uttaritaraṁ vā paṇītataraṁ vā na samanupassati;
an4.16:1.13.en: They don’t see any other subtlety of choices that’s better or finer than that,

sn3.12:4.3.pli: Yehi ca yo rūpehi attamano hoti paripuṇṇasaṅkappo, so tehi rūpehi aññaṁ rūpaṁ uttaritaraṁ vā paṇītataraṁ vā na pattheti.
sn3.12:4.3.en: When you’re happy with certain sights, as you’ve got all you wished for, you don’t want any other sight that’s better or finer.

sn3.12:8.2.pli: Yehi ca yo phoṭṭhabbehi attamano hoti paripuṇṇasaṅkappo, so tehi phoṭṭhabbehi aññaṁ phoṭṭhabbaṁ uttaritaraṁ vā paṇītataraṁ vā na pattheti.
sn3.12:8.2.en: When you’re happy with certain touches, as you’ve got all you wished for, you don’t want any other touch that’s better or finer.

mlDocs.author: Bhikkhu Sujato

an6.44:9.2.pli: Ayaṁ, ānanda, puggalo amunā purimena puggalena abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro ca.
an6.44:9.2.en: is better and finer than the other person.

an6.44:16.2.pli: Ayaṁ, ānanda, puggalo amunā purimena puggalena abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro ca.
an6.44:16.2.en: is better and finer than the other person.

an10.75:12.4.pli: Ayaṁ, ānanda, puggalo amunā purimena puggalena abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro ca.
an10.75:12.4.en: is better and finer than the other person.

an10.75:25.3.pli: Ayaṁ, ānanda, puggalo amunā purimena puggalena abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro ca.
an10.75:25.3.en: is better and finer than the other person.

mlDocs.title:
Numbered Discourses 10.75
8. If You Want
With Migasālā

mlDocs.author: Bhikkhu Sujato

mn31:18.6.pli: Imamhā ca mayaṁ, bhante, phāsuvihārā aññaṁ phāsuvihāraṁ uttaritaraṁ vā paṇītataraṁ vā na samanupassāmā”ti.
mn31:18.6.en: And we don’t see any better or finer way of meditating comfortably than this.”

mn31:18.8.pli: Imamhā phāsuvihārā uttaritaro vā paṇītataro vā phāsuvihāro natthī”ti.
mn31:18.8.en: There is no better or finer way of meditating comfortably than this.”

mlDocs.title:
Middle Discourses 31
The Shorter Discourse at Gosiṅga

mlDocs.author: Bhikkhu Sujato

dn25:19.19.pli: Iti kho taṁ, nigrodha, ṭhānaṁ uttaritarañca paṇītatarañca, yenāhaṁ sāvake vinemi, yena mayā sāvakā vinītā assāsappattā paṭijānanti ajjhāsayaṁ ādibrahmacariyan”ti.
dn25:19.19.en: Well, there is something better and finer than this. That’s what I use to guide my disciples, through which they claim solace in the fundamental purpose of the spiritual life.”

dn25:19.21.pli: “ettha mayaṁ anassāma sācariyakā, na mayaṁ ito bhiyyo uttaritaraṁ pajānāmā”ti.
dn25:19.21.en: “In that case, we’re lost, and so is our tradition! We don’t know anything better or finer than that!”

mlDocs.title:
Long Discourses 25
The Lion’s Roar at the Monastery of Lady Udumbarikā

mlDocs.author: Bhikkhu Sujato

an4.24:7.6.pli: ‘Tamhā ca pana tādimhā añño tādī uttaritaro vā paṇītataro vā natthī’ti vadāmīti.
an4.24:7.6.en: And I say that there is no better or finer poise than this.

mlDocs.title:
Numbered Discourses 4.24
3. At Uruvelā
At Kāḷaka’s Monastery

mlDocs.author: Bhikkhu Sujato

an10.22:2.5.pli: Etasmā cāhaṁ, ānanda, ñāṇā aññaṁ ñāṇaṁ uttaritaraṁ vā paṇītataraṁ vā natthīti vadāmi.
an10.22:2.5.en: And Ānanda, I say that there is no other knowledge better or finer than this.

mlDocs.title:

mlDocs.author: Bhikkhu Sujato

an5.106:7.1.pli: Imamhā cāhaṁ, ānanda, phāsuvihārā añño phāsuvihāro uttaritaro vā paṇītataro vā natthīti vadāmī”ti.
an5.106:7.1.en: And I say that there is no better or finer way of living comfortably than this.”

mlDocs.title:
Numbered Discourses 5.106
11. Living Comfortably
With Ānanda

mlDocs.author: Bhikkhu Sujato

dn8:20.7.pli: Imāya ca, kassapa, sīlasampadāya cittasampadāya paññāsampadāya aññā sīlasampadā cittasampadā paññāsampadā uttaritarā vā paṇītatarā vā natthi.
dn8:20.7.en: And, Kassapa, there is no accomplishment in ethics, mind, and wisdom that is better or finer than this.

mlDocs.title:
Long Discourses 8
The Lion’s Roar to the Naked Ascetic Kassapa

mlDocs.author: Bhikkhu Sujato

dn15:36.3.pli: Imāya ca, ānanda, ubhatobhāgavimuttiyā aññā ubhatobhāgavimutti uttaritarā vā paṇītatarā vā natthī”ti.
dn15:36.3.en: And, Ānanda, there is no other freedom both ways that is better or finer than this.”

mlDocs.title:
Long Discourses 15
The Great Discourse on Causation

dn5:27.16.pli: Imāya ca, brāhmaṇa, yaññasampadāya aññā yaññasampadā uttaritarā vā paṇītatarā vā natthī”ti.
dn5:27.16.en: And, brahmin, there is no other accomplishment of sacrifice which is better and finer than this.”

dn3:2.2.23.pli: Imāya ca, ambaṭṭha, vijjāsampadāya caraṇasampadāya ca aññā vijjāsampadā ca caraṇasampadā ca uttaritarā vā paṇītatarā vā natthi.
dn3:2.2.23.en: And, Ambaṭṭha, there is no accomplishment in knowledge and conduct that is better or finer than this.
